Hi everybody!

After i finally managed to execute Heritrix from my
app (i can give details if needed...) i am stuck with
another problem now... First of all i use heritrix
version 1.3.0-200412111608. I wrote a lil processor
and wanted to test if it can get accessed via
heritrix's web-console... i have the class in
classpath (i know that it works cuz i had exactly the
same classpath-entry with the 1.2.0 release of
heritrix and it worked there) i put the
fully-qualified classname into the
processors.options-file in conf\modules (same goes
here i tested it with 1.2.0 and it works without
problems there)... Somehow i get the feeling there was
something changed with the modules-loading procedure
but i looked into the docs that came with the
1.3.0-200412111608 version but i didn'T find a hint
what i did wrong... Can anybody explain me what i did wrong??
